data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Aydin, Turkey need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aydin, Turkey

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,021,000 people living in the state of Aydin.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Aydin to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Aydin, Turkey and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Syrian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Syrian people.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Aydin, Turkey that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Aydin. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Aydin, Turkey has a population of 1,021,000.

We estimate Aydin has 383 people who might know Jesus, 5,716 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,014,901 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Aydin, Turkey to the gospel today.
